headline: Coinbase, Klarna, Lockheed Martin: Trending stocks
summary: Coinbase (COIN) stock is dragged down by the broader selloff in crypto and bitcoin. Klarna (KLAR) posts its first earnings report since going public in New York. The owner of Arc'teryx, Salomon and Wilson (AS) continues to grow. Akzo Nobel (AKZA.AS) and Axalta (AXTA) agree to merge to form a global industrial coating giant. And Lockheed Martin (LMT) is in focus after Trump says he will approve the sale of F-35 fighter jets to Saudi Arabia. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

content.title: Coinbase, Klarna, Lockheed Martin: Trending stocks
content.description:
Coinbase (COIN) stock is dragged down by the broader selloff in crypto and bitcoin. Klarna (KLAR) posts its first earnings report since going public in New York. The owner of Arc'teryx, Salomon and Wilson (AS) continues to grow. Akzo Nobel (AKZA.AS) and Axalta (AXTA) agree to merge to form a global industrial coating giant. And Lockheed Martin (LMT) is in focus after Trump says he will approve the sale of F-35 fighter jets to Saudi Arabia.

For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.
